description: Detects remote RPC calls to possibly abuse remote printing service via MS-RPRN / MS-PAR Author: Sagie Dulce, Dekel Paz. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Remote Printing Abuse for Lateral Movement
query: (EventLog:"RPCFW" AND winlog.event_id:"3" AND InterfaceUuid:("12345678\-1234\-abcd\-ef00\-0123456789ab" OR "76f03f96\-cdfd\-44fc\-a22c\-64950a001209" OR "0b6edbfa\-4a24\-4fc6\-8a23\-942b1eca65d1" OR "ae33069b\-a2a8\-46ee\-a235\-ddfd339be281"))
